query:
SELECT st.id, st.subject, st.status, st.userId, st.createdAt, 
       (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ticketReplies WHERE ticketId = st.id) as reply_count,
       (SELECT MAX(createdAt) FROM ticketReplies WHERE ticketId = st.id) as last_reply_at
FROM supportTickets st
ORDER BY st.createdAt DESC
LIMIT 10;
